description: This record provides details about received documents including audit request information.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) for the document received record

columns.name: HISTORICAL_DOCUMENT_INFO_ID
columns.description: Historical document information (DCS) records for the object.

columns.name: PAT_GEN_IDN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Patient gender identity for the patient associated with the incoming document.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Transgender Female


Transgender Male


Other


Choose not to disclose

columns.name: PAT_SAAB_C_NAME
columns.description:
Patient sex assigned at birth for the patient associated with the incoming document.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Unknown


Not recorded on birth certificate


Choose not to disclose


Uncertain

columns.name: SOURCE_RFL_ID
columns.description: When receiving a referral complete message for an encounter in another organization, this item links the encounter document to the initiating referral record.

columns.name: HAS_INSURANCE_INFO_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not this contact has insurance updates.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: AUTHOR_NATL_PROV_IDENT
columns.description: The National Provider ID of the author.

columns.name: ERX_PATIENT_LANGUAGE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item represents the patient's preferred language for the external prescription.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ERX_PREVENT_RENEWAL_YN
columns.description:
This item represents whether refill requests should not be sent to the authorizing provider for this external prescription.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HAS_INSURANCE_INFO_YN

columns.name: AUDIT_SOURCE_RFL_ID
columns.description: Stores history of Source Referral ID.

columns.name: UPDATE_NOTIF_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
If the received message was an Update Notification, this column describes the event that triggered the Update Notification.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Encounter Close


Encounter Addendum


Encounter Moved From


Encounter Moved To


Result Added


Result Removed


Coverage Added


Coverage Removed


Result Edited


Immediate Patient-Level Event


Delayed Patient-Level Event


Inpatient Discharge


Coding Completed


Charges Filed


Claim Accepted


Manual Review Complete


Unknown

columns.name: PEHX_SRC_MYPT_ID
columns.description: The MyChart user who answered the history question for the contact.

columns.name: PEHX_SRC_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who answered the history question in non-captive mode for the contact.

columns.name: HAS_MED_HX_INFO_YN
columns.description:
This column indicates whether the contact stores discrete medical history information.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HAS_INSURANCE_INFO_YN

columns.name: ERX_MIXTURE_FORM_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the mixture form of a mixture-based medication.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EVENT_CE_NOTIFICATN_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item describes the type of event which the message represents and is used for displaying the event type in In Basket messages. This item is only set for Event Notifications.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Ambulatory Encounter


Patient Discharged


Patient Arrived at ED


Hospital Outpatient Visit


Patient Admission


Patient Dismissed from ED


Patient Discharged from ED


Emergency


General


Other

columns.name: PUSH_MESSAGE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The incoming message type category ID for the Received Direct messages.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Continuity of Care Document


Incoming Message Reply


Continuity of Care Record


Referral Complete


Referral


360x Referral Request


360x Referral Decline


360x Referral Accept


360x Referral Outcome


360x Referral Cancel


360x Referral Cancel Confirmation


360x Interim Consultation Note


360x New Appointment


360x Reschedule Appointment


360x Cancel Appointment


360x No-show Notification


Reject


Event Notification


InBasket


ADT Notification


On-Demand CCD


SMTP


XCA Deferred Response


GWN Reject


Kill Referral


Update Notification


Payer Encounter Detail


Telehealth


Unknown

columns.name: PEHX_SRC_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Stores the contact serial number (CSN) of the encounter a history question submission is associated with.

columns.name: HAS_ICU_STAY_UPD_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the external document record contact has updated ICU stay data.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HAS_INSURANCE_INFO_YN

columns.name: FHIR_BINARY_URL
columns.description: Contains the URL at which the attachment content can be retrieved

columns.name: IMR_REPLY_RCVD_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant the most recent reply was received from the remote organization

columns.name: RELATES_TO
columns.description: Stores the content of the RelatesTo header from a direct message.

columns.name: REPLYTO_ADDRESS_EXT_ADDR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the External Address record to which replies to this message should go. This item is only populated for messages sent through Direct SMTP.

columns.name: REPLYTO_ADDRESS_EXT_ADDR_ID_MIXED_DIRECT_ADDR
columns.description: Formatted like an email address, this is how Direct messaging knows where to send a message. This item is stored in mixed case to use in display in addressing.

columns.name: MATCH_UPDATE_ON_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the patient record match is updated for a Received Document.

columns.name: PAT_NAME_PREFIX
columns.description: This column contains the title associated with the patient's name.

columns.name: EXT_MED_COVERAGE_IDENT
columns.description: This item stores the coverage ID of the patient under each PBM.

columns.name: PAT_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The county of the patient's address from the received document. NOTE: Not all DXR use cases discretely parse this item.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_LIVING_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds status information about whether the patient is deceased. NOTE: Not all DXR use cases discretely parse this item.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Alive


Deceased


Not A Patient

columns.name: PAT_DEATH_DATE
columns.description: Holds information about when the patient died if known in the received document. NOTE: Not all DXR use cases discretely parse this item.

columns.name: PAT_MARITAL_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds discrete marital status information from the received document.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Annulled


Divorced


Interlocutory


Legally Separated


Married


Polygamous


Never Married


Domestic partner


Widowed


Unknown


Common Law


Unmarried

columns.name: PAT_MARITAL_STAT_TEXT
columns.description: Holds the display name of the received document for remapping purposes.

columns.name: HAS_NOTE_SECTION_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the contact stores note section data.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HAS_INSURANCE_INFO_YN

columns.name: HAS_TREAT_RESTR_UPD_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the contact stores treatment restrictions


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HAS_INSURANCE_INFO_YN

columns.name: CLINICAL_NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the Clinical Note contact containing the text retrieved as a part of this received document's contact.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_TITLE
columns.description: Free text title of a received document
